name: Slice 'n' Dice (Skinkified)
description:
Skinkified- Art, Programming

Jojo- Programming

tigeryasou- Music, Programming

Vamonkea- Background art

Made in Godot https://godotengine.org/license

WASD - Move

Left Click - Charge and throw

1, 2, 3, 4, 5 - Select d4, d6, d8, d10, d12 respectively

Different dice have different effects!
d4 - Poison

d6 - No charge

d8 - Chance to crit

d10 - Knockback

d12 - Highest damage
